member.summary: Gets the object types (as enum flags).

member.name: P:NJsonSchema.JsonSchema4.DocumentPath
member.summary: Gets the document path (URI or file path) for resolving relative references.

member.summary: Gets or sets the type reference path ($ref).

member.summary: Gets or sets the type reference.

member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether this is a type reference.

member.summary: Gets the actual schema, either this or the reference schema.
member.exception: The schema reference path has not been resolved.

member.summary: Gets the parent schema of this schema.

member.summary: Gets or sets the format string.

member.summary: Gets or sets the default value.

member.name: P:NJsonSchema.JsonSchema4.MultipleOf
member.summary: Gets or sets the required multiple of for the number value.

member.name: P:NJsonSchema.JsonSchema4.Maximum
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum allowed value.

member.name: P:NJsonSchema.JsonSchema4.IsExclusiveMaximum
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the maximum value is excluded.

member.name: P:NJsonSchema.JsonSchema4.Minimum
member.summary: Gets or sets the minimum allowed value.

member.name: P:NJsonSchema.JsonSchema4.IsExclusiveMinimum
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the minimum value is excluded.

member.name: P:NJsonSchema.JsonSchema4.MaxLength
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum length of the value string.

member.name: P:NJsonSchema.JsonSchema4.MinLength
member.summary: Gets or sets the minimum length of the value string.

member.name: P:NJsonSchema.JsonSchema4.Pattern
member.summary: Gets or sets the validation pattern as regular expression.

member.name: P:NJsonSchema.JsonSchema4.MaxItems
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum length of the array.

member.name: P:NJsonSchema.JsonSchema4.MinItems
member.summary: Gets or sets the minimum length of the array.

member.name: P:NJsonSchema.JsonSchema4.UniqueItems
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the items in the array must be unique.

member.name: P:NJsonSchema.JsonSchema4.MaxProperties
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximal number of allowed properties in an object.

member.name: P:NJsonSchema.JsonSchema4.MinProperties
member.summary: Gets or sets the minimal number of allowed properties in an object.

member.name: P:NJsonSchema.JsonSchema4.Enumeration
member.summary: Gets the collection of required properties.

member.name: P:NJsonSchema.JsonSchema4.IsEnumeration
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether this is enumeration.

members.member: Gets the collection of required properties. This collection can also be changed through the property. >

member.name: P:NJsonSchema.JsonSchema4.Properties
member.summary: Gets the properties of the type.

member.name: P:NJsonSchema.JsonSchema4.PatternProperties
member.summary: Gets the pattern properties of the type.

member.name: P:NJsonSchema.JsonSchema4.Item
member.summary: Gets or sets the schema of an array item.

member.name: P:NJsonSchema.JsonSchema4.Items
member.summary: Gets or sets the schemas of the array's tuple values.

member.name: P:NJsonSchema.JsonSchema4.Not
member.summary: Gets or sets the schema which must not be valid.

member.name: P:NJsonSchema.JsonSchema4.Definitions
member.summary: Gets the other schema definitions of this schema.

member.name: P:NJsonSchema.JsonSchema4.ResourceDefinitions
member.summary: Gets or sets the resource definitions (not in the standard, needed in some JSON Schemas).

member.name: P:NJsonSchema.JsonSchema4.AllOf
member.summary: Gets the collection of schemas where each schema must be valid.

member.name: P:NJsonSchema.JsonSchema4.AnyOf
member.summary: Gets the collection of schemas where at least one must be valid.

member.name: P:NJsonSchema.JsonSchema4.OneOf
member.summary: Gets the collection of schemas where exactly one must be valid.

member.name: P:NJsonSchema.JsonSchema4.AllowAdditionalItems
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether additional items are allowed (default: true).
member.remarks: If this property is set to false, then is set to null.

member.name: P:NJsonSchema.JsonSchema4.AdditionalItemsSchema
member.summary: Gets or sets the schema for the additional items.
member.remarks: If this property has a schema, then is set to true.

member.name: P:NJsonSchema.JsonSchema4.AllowAdditionalProperties
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether additional properties are allowed (default: true).
member.remarks: If this property is set to false, then is set to null.

member.name: P:NJsonSchema.JsonSchema4.AdditionalPropertiesSchema
member.summary: Gets or sets the schema for the additional properties.
member.remarks: If this property has a schema, then is set to true.

member.name: P:NJsonSchema.JsonSchema4.IsDictionary
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the schema represents a dictionary type (no properties and AdditionalProperties contains a schema).

member.name: P:NJsonSchema.JsonSchema4.IsAnyType
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether this is any type (e.g. any in TypeScript or object in CSharp).

member.name: M:NJsonSchema.JsonSchema4.IsNullable(NJsonSchema.NullHandling)
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the validated data can be null.

member.summary: Serializes the to a JSON string.

member.summary: Serializes the to a JSON string.

member.summary: Validates the given JSON data against this schema.

member.summary: Validates the given JSON token against this schema.

member.summary: Finds the root parent of this schema.
member.returns: The parent schema or this when this is the root.

member.name: T:NJsonSchema.NullHandling
member.summary: Defines how to express the nullability of a property.

member.name: F:NJsonSchema.NullHandling.JsonSchema
member.summary: Uses oneOf with null schema and null type to express the nullability of a property (valid JSON Schema draft v4).

member.name: F:NJsonSchema.NullHandling.Swagger
member.summary: Uses required to express the nullability of a property (not valid in JSON Schema draft v4).

member.name: T:NJsonSchema.Validation.ValidationErrorKind
member.summary: Enumeration of the possible error kinds.

member.name: F:NJsonSchema.Validation.ValidationErrorKind.Unknown
member.summary: An unknown error.

member.name: F:NJsonSchema.Validation.ValidationErrorKind.StringExpected
member.summary: A string is expected.

member.name: F:NJsonSchema.Validation.ValidationErrorKind.NumberExpected
member.summary: A number is expected.

member.name: F:NJsonSchema.Validation.ValidationErrorKind.IntegerExpected
member.summary: An integer is expected.

member.name: F:NJsonSchema.Validation.ValidationErrorKind.BooleanExpected
member.summary: A boolean is expected.

member.name: F:NJsonSchema.Validation.ValidationErrorKind.ObjectExpected
member.summary: An object is expected.

member.name: F:NJsonSchema.Validation.ValidationErrorKind.PropertyRequired
member.summary: The property is required but not found.

member.name: F:NJsonSchema.Validation.ValidationErrorKind.ArrayExpected
member.summary: An array is expected.

member.name: F:NJsonSchema.Validation.ValidationErrorKind.NullExpected
member.summary: An array is expected.

member.name: F:NJsonSchema.Validation.ValidationErrorKind.PatternMismatch
member.summary: The Regex pattern does not match.

member.name: F:NJsonSchema.Validation.ValidationErrorKind.StringTooShort
member.summary: The string is too short.

member.name: F:NJsonSchema.Validation.ValidationErrorKind.StringTooLong
member.summary: The string is too long.

member.name: F:NJsonSchema.Validation.ValidationErrorKind.NumberTooSmall
member.summary: The number is too small.

member.name: F:NJsonSchema.Validation.ValidationErrorKind.NumberTooBig
member.summary: The number is too big.

member.name: F:NJsonSchema.Validation.ValidationErrorKind.IntegerTooBig
member.summary: The integer is too big.

member.name: F:NJsonSchema.Validation.ValidationErrorKind.TooManyItems
member.summary: The array contains too many items.

member.name: F:NJsonSchema.Validation.ValidationErrorKind.TooFewItems
member.summary: The array contains too few items.

member.name: F:NJsonSchema.Validation.ValidationErrorKind.ItemsNotUnique
member.summary: The items in the array are not unique.

member.name: F:NJsonSchema.Validation.ValidationErrorKind.DateTimeExpected
member.summary: A date time is expected.

member.name: F:NJsonSchema.Validation.ValidationErrorKind.UriExpected
member.summary: An URI is expected.

member.name: F:NJsonSchema.Validation.ValidationErrorKind.IpV4Expected
member.summary: An IP v4 address is expected.

member.name: F:NJsonSchema.Validation.ValidationErrorKind.IpV6Expected
member.summary: An IP v6 address is expected.

member.name: F:NJsonSchema.Validation.ValidationErrorKind.GuidExpected
member.summary: A valid GUID is expected.

member.name: F:NJsonSchema.Validation.ValidationErrorKind.NotAnyOf
member.summary: The object is not any of the given schemas.

member.name: F:NJsonSchema.Validation.ValidationErrorKind.NotAllOf
member.summary: The object is not all of the given schemas.

member.name: F:NJsonSchema.Validation.ValidationErrorKind.NotOneOf
member.summary: The object is not one of the given schemas.

member.name: F:NJsonSchema.Validation.ValidationErrorKind.ExcludedSchemaValidates
member.summary: The object matches the not allowed schema.

member.name: F:NJsonSchema.Validation.ValidationErrorKind.NumberNotMultipleOf
member.summary: The number is not a multiple of the given number.

member.name: F:NJsonSchema.Validation.ValidationErrorKind.IntegerNotMultipleOf
member.summary: The integer is not a multiple of the given integer.

member.name: F:NJsonSchema.Validation.ValidationErrorKind.NotInEnumeration
member.summary: The value is not one of the allowed enumerations.

member.name: F:NJsonSchema.Validation.ValidationErrorKind.EmailExpected
member.summary: An Email is expected.

member.name: F:NJsonSchema.Validation.ValidationErrorKind.HostnameExpected
member.summary: An hostname is expected.

member.name: F:NJsonSchema.Validation.ValidationErrorKind.TooManyItemsInTuple
member.summary: The array tuple contains too many items.

member.name: F:NJsonSchema.Validation.ValidationErrorKind.ArrayItemNotValid
member.summary: An array item is not valid.

member.name: F:NJsonSchema.Validation.ValidationErrorKind.AdditionalItemNotValid
member.summary: The item is not valid with the AdditionalItems schema.

member.name: F:NJsonSchema.Validation.ValidationErrorKind.AdditionalPropertiesNotValid
member.summary: The additional properties are not valid.

member.name: F:NJsonSchema.Validation.ValidationErrorKind.NoAdditionalPropertiesAllowed
member.summary: Additional/unspecified properties are not allowed.

member.name: F:NJsonSchema.Validation.ValidationErrorKind.TooManyProperties
member.summary: There are too many properties in the object.

member.name: F:NJsonSchema.Validation.ValidationErrorKind.TooFewProperties
member.summary: There are too few properties in the tuple.

member.name: F:NJsonSchema.Validation.ValidationErrorKind.Base64Expected
member.summary: A Base64 string is expected.
